metadata.Title: CVE-2020-13230 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - low
metadata.Description:
In Cacti before 1.2.11, disabling a user account does not immediatelyinvalidate any permissions granted to that account (e.g., permission toview logs).

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-13230` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

cacti - 1.1.38+ds1-1ubuntu0.1~esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: cacti package in esm-apps/bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.1.38+ds1-1ubuntu0.1~esm1').
